projects.title: Circle of Trust
projects.description: Circle of Trust is a platform that connects you with trusted job opportunities and local events based on your location, making it easier to discover what’s happening around you.

projects.title: Dr-Ahmad-Alfailakawi(English Version)
projects.description: An English version of a multilingual WordPress website for Dr. Ahmad Alfailakawi, a professor at the University of Kuwait, featuring research work, published papers, and curated educational blogs using Elementor and PHP.

projects.title: CPR Services Websites made using WordPress
projects.description: A professional CPR training and certification website built using WordPress and Elementor, featuring custom sections powered by ACF for easy content management and a fully responsive design.

projects.title: Asia Golden Rice Selling Website made in React JS.
projects.description: A modern product showcase website for Thailand’s Asia Golden Rice brand, built using React JS with a fast, responsive interface and smooth user experience.

projects.title: Dr Emil Suder Portfolio Website made using WordPress
projects.description: A sleek and modern portfolio website for Dr. Emil Suder, developed using WordPress and Elementor,featuring custom-designed pages, smooth navigation, and an elegant, responsive layout.

projects.title: Medical Billing Website made using WordPress
projects.description: A fully responsive one Pager medical billing website built with WordPress and Elementor, featuring service-focused layouts, custom sections, and a clean, healthcare-oriented design.

projects.title: Portfolio Website made using WordPress, Elementor
projects.description: A modern personal portfolio website for IT Person built with WordPress and Elementor, showcasing projects, skills, and achievements through a clean and responsive design.

projects.title: Accessories, Products & Automotive Blogs Site
projects.description: A WordPress blog website for car enthusiasts, built with Elementor and PHP, featuring a clean design, easy navigation, and engaging content for automotive blogging.

projects.title: Farming Products, Animal Feed & Machinery E-commerce Website
projects.description: An e-commerce website for farming products, including animal feed and machinery, built with WordPress and Elementor, featuring a responsive design and user-friendly shopping experience.

projects.title: Showcasing Student Creativity Website
projects.description: A website for College Student for showcasing Artwork and work related to College.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A Portfolio Website for Dr Gloria M Payne, showcasing Life Past Work

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A corporate portfolio website for Geco Group of Companies, built with WordPress and Elementor, showcasing their services, projects, and company profile in a professional, responsive design.

projects.title: Portfolio Website of Dr Ahmad Alfailakawi (Arabic Version)
projects.description: An Arabic version of a multilingual WordPress website for Dr. Ahmad Alfailakawi, a professor at the University of Kuwait, featuring research work, published papers, and curated educational blogs using Elementor and PHP.

projects.title: Members, Events & Resources Website
projects.description: A WordPress website for the Independent Order of Odd Fellows (IA chapter), built with Elementor and PHP, featuring member information, events, and organizational resources in a responsive layout.

projects.title: Blog website for technology enthusiasts
projects.description: A WordPress blog website for technology enthusiasts, built with Elementor and PHP, featuring a clean layout, easy navigation, and engaging tech-related content.

projects.title: Qimamaffan – Mobile Repairing Website
projects.description: A WordPress website for mobile repairing services, built with Elementor and PHP, featuring service listings, contact options, and a responsive, user-friendly design.

projects.title: SmartWastes – Website Recovery Project
projects.description: Website recovery project for SmartWastes, restoring the site from a cPanel backup using PHP to ensure full functionality and data integrity.

projects.title: THE-STUDIO – Salon & Spa Website
projects.description: A modern WordPress website for THE STUDIO salon and spa, built with Elementor and PHP, featuring service listings, booking options, and a stylish, responsive design.

projects.title: ToolFlame – Tools & DIY Website
projects.description: A professional tools-focused website built using WordPress and Elementor, designed to showcase and review a wide range of hardware and DIY tools with a clean, user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Wollongong Car Mechanic Website
projects.description: A modern, service-focused mechanic website built with WordPress and Elementor, featuring detailed service pages, booking functionality, and a clean layout tailored for automotive businesses.

projects.title: IOOFPM – Odd Fellows Organization Website
projects.description: A WordPress-based website built with Elementor for the Independent Order of the Odd Fellows, showcasing their mission, community programs, membership details, and organizational activities with a clean and informative layout.
